opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2016, the Motion for Leave to File a Reply is GRANTED, and the Application for Extraordinary Relief or the Exercise of King’s Bench Powers is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
